title: The Covid Treatment That Comes in a Pill Bottle
description:
Pharmaceutical giant Merck has developed a drug against Covid, the first treatment that wouldn't require hospitalization. But WSJ's Jared S. Hopkins tells us distributing it equitably around the world will be a challenge.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
